name: ESCAPE
effect: With a snarl the Chestburster flees, moving two zones away in one action, into the nearest vent, sewer or duct if possible. As soon as the PCs lose line of sight the Chestburster has escaped. Stealth mode ensues as the Chestburster tries to hide and grow.

name: TERRORIZING HISS
effect: The Chestburster jumps towards a target, flashing its razor-sharp teeth and hissing malevolently. The target must make an immediate Panic Roll.

name: THROAT BITE
